title: HOUR 1 - Watson, Tomlin, Westbrook
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Watson, Tomlin, Westbrook
description:
Deshaun Watson is close to being traded to the Dolphins

Why Mike Tomlin took offense to being rumored for the USC job

Russell Westbrook played well in a no pressure type game


Guest: Nick Wright

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
